title: Who's this lady please and do I have to finish the VOD completely to finish the quest?
body:
https://i.imgur.com/dVCQr2r.png

e.g I can't skip a few seconds near to the end

replies.body:
That's Sjokz, she's great.

Generally, for watch missions you have to watch at least 10 minutes of a VOD, but sometimes it can take longer to update.  It doesn't have to be your active window, so I'd recommend (if you don't want to watch anymore of it) to just mute it, leave it open, and do something else.

EDIT: Also I'm not sure an LEC game will count for the "Welcome to Worlds" mission. I believe only actual Worlds games (they start tomorrow) will count for that one.

> [{quoted}](name=Seras Dragon,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=jKXa3B4V,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-10-01T06:00:34.205+0000)
>
> That's Sjokz, she's great.
> 
> Generally, for watch missions you have to watch at least 10 minutes of a VOD, but sometimes it can take longer to update.  It doesn't have to be your active window, so I'd recommend (if you don't want to watch anymore of it) to just mute it, leave it open, and do something else.
> 
> EDIT: Also I'm not sure an LEC game will count for the "Welcome to Worlds" mission. I believe only actual Worlds games (they start tomorrow) will count for that one.

P.S why does your icon change to the void in notifications but looks goodygoody in normal forums lol, kinda scary and here's the comments that got taken off even though they were relevant unless somebody's being a donkey and reporting me for nonsense. I just realized it was for necroing, why is it necroing if I Google for posts that could help me where there's already alot of people that's posted who could verify or help with the problem please (I went to go cook spring rolls and eat dinner lol). Aw poo, yeah it didn't count twice (the watch quest)

The icon is because the notification interface doesn't currently recognise the volunteer icon. The dark star one is what I'm using in-game at the moment, so it's showing there same as you have the Targon icon.

As for the removals, to save repeating myself I'll point you to this post where I explained at length to someone else why we delete necros: https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/3ufcVBKN-i-received-a-post-removed-message-and-need-clarification-please?comment=0000

aw okay, tyvm but it says VOD and the video is under the VOD category according to the site and I just had 3 posts for asking people to use the riot support option to report people who are extra naughty and 1 of them had an experience I had in Dota 2 because the poster mentioned it

The notifications up the top right of boards tell you why your content is being removed.

As for the missions, it says "live game or VOD of the 2019 World Championship" specifically, which is what makes me think LEC games won't count.
